sentences.en: After analyzed accident producing factors, pertinently bring forward precautionary measures.
sentences.cn: 通过分析产生事故的因素, 有针对性地提出了预防办法.

sentences.en: As a precautionary measure repeat the medication.
sentences.cn: 作为预防性措施，请重复用药。

sentences.en: But, Greenpeace grumbles, it is not sufficiently " precautionary " in other areas.
sentences.cn: 然而“绿色和平”表示不满, 称该公司在其它领域还未能遵循 “ 预防原则 ”.

sentences.en: Conclusion: It's important to strengthen the precautionary measueres to keep our health.
sentences.cn: 结论加强微粒对输液液体污染的防范措施以维护人类健康势在必行.

sentences.en: He thrust aside all precautionary advice.
sentences.cn: 他对一切事先忠告都置之不理.

sentences.en: He thrusts aside all precautionary advice.
sentences.cn: 他把一切警告都置之一边.

sentences.en: I would take precautionary steps to keep him away.
sentences.cn: 我要做些预防措施以使他离开.

sentences.en: It is should free that dot hits precautionary needle?
sentences.cn: 小孩子打预防针是不是应该免费的?

sentences.en: More troops were sent to the area as a precautionary measure .
sentences.cn: 为谨慎起见，更多的军队被派往该地区。

sentences.en: Precautionary cadre a crime, need self - discipline and heteronomy couple, underline legal tie.
sentences.cn: 预防干部犯罪, 需要 自律 与他律结合, 强调法律约束.

sentences.en: Precautionary systems are launched in many universities and are given significant emphasis.
sentences.cn: 许多大学已经设立了预防系统并给与了足够的重视.

sentences.en: The local administration says the curfew is a precautionary measure.
sentences.cn: 地方当局说宵禁是一种预防措施。

sentences.en: Therefore; As a precautionary measure, taking vitamin C, should eat shrimp.
sentences.cn: 所以; 为慎重起见, 在服用维生素C期间, 应当忌食虾类.

sentences.en: They are taking precautionary measures to safeguard their forces from the effects of chemical weapons.
sentences.cn: 他们正采取预防措施保护其军队免受化学武器的伤害。

sentences.en: This was purely precautionary with all three players.
sentences.cn: 这完全是对三名球员的预防措施.

sentences.en: Wiping out insects is the main precautionary measure keep trees growing healthily.
sentences.cn: 为了树木的健康成长,治虫是最主要的预防措施.

words.tran_cn: 预防的；留心的；预先警戒的

trans.tran_en: done in order to prevent something dangerous or unpleasant from happening
